segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, so focused on what she's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hoping to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing when I was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water keeps running, and the puddle keeps growing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at the memory.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
